schema.title: BusinessAssociate
schema.description: A legal or administrative body, person, institution, or company, or any of its divisions.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

BusinessAssociateID.title: External Business Associate Identifier
BusinessAssociateID.description: Native identifier from a Master Data Management System or other trusted source external to OSDU - stored here in order to allow for multi-system connection and synchronization. If used, the "Source" property should identify that source system.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The name of the business associate.

PurposeDescription.title: Purpose Description
PurposeDescription.description: The reason why the business associated was formed.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: Textual description of the nature of the organisation.

EffectiveDate.title: Effective Date
EffectiveDate.description: The date and time at which a given business associate becomes effective.

TerminationDate.title: Termination Date
TerminationDate.description: The date and time at which a given business associate is no longer in effect.

OrganisationTypeID.title: Organisation Type ID
OrganisationTypeID.description: Category the organisational structure fits into. Possible values - Operating Unit, Operating sub Unit, A Business, A Department, Government Agency, etc.
OrganisationTypeID.x-osdu-existing-standard: PPDM R_BA_TYPE corresponds to OSDU OrganisationType

ParentBusinessAssociateID.title: Parent Business Associate ID
ParentBusinessAssociateID.description: If populated, this is the parent business associate of the current business associate. In case of de-mergers/splits, this relationship identified the Business Associate, which was split up.

CurrentStatus.title: Current Business Associate Status
CurrentStatus.description: The current status of the Business Associate, such as Active, In Receivership, Sold, Merged. Main sheet

StatusTypeID.title: Status Type ID
StatusTypeID.description: The current status of the Business Associate, such as Active, In Receivership, Sold, Merged. Property #1

EffectiveDate.title: Effective Date
EffectiveDate.description: The date and time at which a given business associate status becomes effective.

TerminationDate.title: Termination Date
TerminationDate.description: The date and time at which a given business associate status is no longer in effect.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A remark about the business associate status in time.

PreviousStates.title: Previous Business Associate States
PreviousStates.description: The array of historical business associate status together with the time interval of validity and a remark.

items.title: BAStatus
items.description: Describes a BusinessAssociate's status in time.

StatusTypeID.title: Status Type ID
StatusTypeID.description: The current status of the Business Associate, such as Active, In Receivership, Sold, Merged. Property #1

EffectiveDate.title: Effective Date
EffectiveDate.description: The date and time at which a given business associate status becomes effective.

TerminationDate.title: Termination Date
TerminationDate.description: The date and time at which a given business associate status is no longer in effect.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A remark about the business associate status in time.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: Narrative remarks about this Business Associate.

Addresses.title: Organisation Addresses
Addresses.description: The Addresses array contains information on the address, phone numbers, primary contacts, and location of the business associate, allowing clients to have multiple addresses. For example, companies that have a headquarters and various satellite offices.

items.title: Address
items.description: An array of many addresses displayed as table. Organisation Address table contains information on the address, phone numbers, primary contacts, and location of the business associate, allowing clients to have multiple addresses. For example, compan ies that have a headquarters and various satellite offices.

IsActive.title: Is Active
IsActive.description: A Y/N flag indicating whether this Organisation Address is currently either active / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).

AddressTypeID.title: Address Type ID
AddressTypeID.description: The type of business associate address. For example shipping, billing, sales...

AddressLines.title: Adress Lines
AddressLines.description: One or more lines of address for a business associate.

PostalCode.title: Postal Code
PostalCode.description: Code number assigned by the postal service identifying a mail delivery zone.

ProvinceState.title: Province / State
ProvinceState.description: Unique identifier for the area that is the Country Note that if you choose, you could use only the City relationship and derive the Country and StateProvince (or other subdivision). Alternatively, you may choose to populate all three relationships explicitly. For example states, provinces or other political subdivisions of countries.

Country.title: Country
Country.description: Unique identifier for the area that is the Country. Note that if you choose, you could use only the City relationship and derive the Country and StateProvince (or other subdivision). Alternatively, you may choose to populate all three relationships explicitly. For example Austria, Canada, United Kingdom, USA, Venezuela.

OfficeTypeID.title: Office Type ID
OfficeTypeID.description: The type of office, such as branch, lab facility, etc.

IsPreferred.title: Is Preferred
IsPreferred.description: A flag indicating this contact information is primary or preferred for the given AddressTypeID.

PrimaryContact.title: Primary Contact
PrimaryContact.description: The primary contact for this address.

Authorities.title: Organisation Authorities
Authorities.description: Describes the set of authorities held by a business associate to make payments, sign contracts etc. Considered as business context.

items.title: OrganisationAuthority
items.description: Describes the authority held by a business associate to make payments, sign contracts etc. Considered in a business context. Application or database authorities are held in ENTITLEMENTS.

AuthorityID.title: Authority Identified
AuthorityID.description: Unique identifier for the row that describes the authority that a business associate has over business objects.

IsActive.title: Is Active
IsActive.description: A flag indicating whether this data is currently either active / valid (True) or inactive / invalid (False).

AuthorityTypeID.title: Authority Type ID
AuthorityTypeID.description: The type of authority given to a business associate, often an employee of a company. Authority may be extended for purchase authorizations, to sign contracts or to enter into negotiations etc.

AuthorisedByID.title: Authorised By ID
AuthorisedByID.description: The unique identifier of the BusinessAssociate who authorized this level of authority.

EffectiveDate.title: Effective Date
EffectiveDate.description: Date on which this Authority came into effect.

TerminationDate.title: Termination Date
TerminationDate.description: Date on which this Authority was no longer in effect.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: Narrative remarks about this BusinessAssociate Authority.

RepresentedByID.title: Represented By ID
RepresentedByID.description: The unique identifier of the BusinessAssociate who the authorized person represents for this authority. May be a subsidiary, a company etc.

Contacts.title: Organisation Contacts
Contacts.description: Represents the contact information for a company. May be a phone number, fax number, EMail address, Web URL etc.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: Describes the set of primary services provided by a business associate. For example drilling contractor, logging com pany, seismic broker etc.

items.title: Service
items.description: Describes the primary services provided by a business associate. For example drilling contractor, logging company, seismic broker etc.

ServiceTypeID.title: Service Type ID
ServiceTypeID.description: The service that a business associate provides. For example well logging, drilling, application development.

IsActive.title: Is Active
IsActive.description: A flag indicating whether this Service is currently either active/valid (True) or inactive/invalid (False).

EffectiveDate.title: Effective Date
EffectiveDate.description: The date on which the service came into effect.

TerminationDate.title: Termination Date
TerminationDate.description: The date on which this service was no longer in effect.

ServiceQualityTypeID.title: Service Quality Type ID
ServiceQualityTypeID.description: A code indicating the quality of service received from this service.

Person.title: Person
Person.description: Where the Business Associate is a person, this holds the contact information.

SuccessorID.title: Successor ID
SuccessorID.description: The succeeding organisation/business associate in case of mergers and acquisitions.
